text.tspan: Note: If very small motion is estimated return a flag to say that there was no motion. The user of
this function should then store the old odom and scan and send those in together with the new odom
and scan that is not perform the typical old=new at the end of its loop. This is to avoid drift that is caused
by thresholding away really small motions. The threshold for saying that we are not movoing has to be
in the order of a few millimeters at least and that could actually corresponds to real but slow motion
f you are sampling the laser fast.
